description: Multi-purpose data points for defining a curve.  The use of this generic class is discouraged if a more specific class  can be used to specify the x and y axis values along with their specific data types.

contents.name: Curve
contents.description: The point data values that define this curve.

contents.name: xvalue
contents.description: The data value of the X-axis variable,  depending on the X-axis units.

contents.name: y1value
contents.description: The data value of the  first Y-axis variable, depending on the Y-axis units.

contents.name: y2value
contents.description: The data value of the second Y-axis variable (if present), depending on the Y-axis units.
